skills.name: BULLDOZE
desc: • Deals 3 hits of magic damage to a single target.
• 20% Chance to Stun the target each hit.
• Deal Additional Magic Damage if the target is stunned.

skills.name: TEMPER
desc: • Deals 3 hits of magic damage to a single target.
• Remove Immunity effects from the target.
• Grant an Extra Turn to self and a random ally if Immunity is removed.
• Grant Accuracy Up to all allies.

skills.name: REBEL
desc: Stun or Freeze a random enemy for every ally that is Stunned or Frozen (including by unblockable Freeze) and Cleanse self of all Negative Effects, including Silver.
